DOC.brief_summary: effect concept map teach critical thinking do randomize study
DOC.brief_title: Effect Concept Mapping Teaching Method Critical Thinking Skills Medical Students
DOC.detailed_description: This quasi-experimental study two group design pre-posttest method conduct Ahvaz University Medical Sciences 2014 . About 100 Medical Students third semester recruit study base census . Participants divide two intervention control group use random sample Random Number Table List . Students control group lecture Anatomy use traditional lecture method . Whereas , student experimental group teach Anatomy use concept map teach method . Student 's critical thinking evaluate examine '' Standard California Critical Thinking Skills Questionnaire ''
DOC.criteria: student 1st semester medicine accept participation study accept participate
